title: [Champion Concept] Oh'Deer, the magical stag!
body:
**(Champion Concept) Oh’Deer, the magical stag**

_Disclaimer:
This champion concept was made by my little brother, JayBird. He did the abilities and I did the ratios, etc._

**Overview:**
Oh’Deer is a hybrid champion who can be built MANY ways. He is a very versatile champion, and can go a lot of lanes.

Inspired by:
{{champion:106}} {{champion:120}} 
Plays most like:
{{champion:12}} 

**Appearance:**
Oh’Deer is a magical stag with brown fur and large horns. He wears golden armour and fights ferociously.

**Attributes:**
Hybrid (Mage/Fighter)

**Roles:**
Mid
Top
Jungler

**Basic Stats:**
HEALTH			584 – 2046
ATTACK DAMAGE	60 – 116
HEALTH REGEN.	8.1 – 19.1
ATTACK SPEED		0.658
MANA			270 – 780
ARMOR			26.4 – 85.9
MANA REGEN.		8.1 – 19.1
MAGIC RES.		32.1 – 53.4
RANGE			125
MOVE SPEED		350

**Abilities:**
Passive – Upset
When Oh’Deer dies, enemies get poisoned.

Q – Sharpen (toggle – 3 seconds on/off)
Oh’Deer’s horns go red and he deals extra AP damage on every basic attack. He also gets 50% life steal on his first hit.
(mana cost on-hit: 10/15/20/25/30)


W – Charge (18/17/15/14/12) seconds)
Oh’Deer rushes to a position, knocking up enemies.
(mana cost: 35/40/45/50/60)

E – Oak cure (16/15/13/12/10 seconds)
Oh’Deer cures himself of all CC and heals mana.
(health cost: 40/45/50/55/60)

R – Concussion (100/80/60 seconds)
Oh’Deer knocks up enemies and when they come down they have reduced attack speed and movement speed.
(mana cost: 100/120/140)

**Lore:**
Oh’Deer lived in a peaceful forest but then a terrible Demacia v Noxus battle came there so he was forced to leave. He then joined the League of Legends because he didn’t have a home and also because he wanted to seek revenge.

**Dialogue:**
Idle:
I am NOT a bull!
Movement:
Oh’Deer AWAY!
Basic attacks:
Feel the power of my horns!
Abilities:
Get knocked up, kiddo!

replies.body: Just one problem, the "'" means that the champion came from the void.
